result.title: User Centric Design I
result.description: In addition to the functional and nonfunctional specifications the user centric design approaches need to be defined to ensure that the solutions are designed and delivered in a way that makes them interesting and useful for the target users This report will provide the principles and methodology that will be applied to design usercentric personalised healthcare solutions

result.title: Secondary data capture and interoperability I
result.description: This report describes the mechanisms developed to capture and ingest secondary data eg from mobile and wearable platforms in the iHELP big data platform covering APIs gateways security protocols query mechanisms message brokers and also interoperability mechanisms that allow data from multiple sources to be seamlessly used by analytic applications
